author: Jessica Wong
description: Daily physical activity levels for Canadian children and teens dropped significantly during the pandemic, as school itself has become more sedentary. It's time, say experts, to get kids moving again.
title: From juggling to cricket: How parents and teachers can help kids kick the pandemic slump
